TEXT.TITLE: CHEROKEE GROUP <CHKE> FILES TO OFFER SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Cherokee Group said it has filed for an offering of 2,500,000 common shares, including 700,000 to be sold by shareholders, through underwriters First Boston Inc <FBC> and American Express Co <AXP> unit Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc. It said it will use its proceeds to repay bank debt, for capital spending and for general corporate purposes including possible acquisitions. Reuter
